title: Bot Framework Composer
description:
Bot Framework Composer is an integrated development tool for developers and multi-disciplinary teams to build bots and conversational experiences with the Microsoft Bot Framework. In this episode of AI show, Seth Juarez is joined by Vishwac Sena Kannan, Program Manager for Bot Framework to introduce and demo Bot Framework Composer. Visit https://aka.ms/BotFrameworkComp to get started. 

Re-Visit Your Favorite Part:
[00:47] – Introduction and overview
[01:45] – Demo – Creating a new bot with Bot Framework Composer
[02:25] – Walkthrough – local bot runtime
[03:30] – Demo – triggers, actions
[05:06] – Language generation integration
[06:08] – Sample bot with Language understanding (LUIS)
[09:00] – Handling interruptions
[11:10] – Wrap up
